name: VIEWPOINT Overhead Fantasy Free Hero
description:
VIEWPOINT Overhead Fantasy Free Hero is a comprehensive spritesheet for a tunic wearing sword wielding hero. It is designed to match overhead tilesets like #NotZelda or any of the upcoming VIEWPOINT Overhead Fantasy tilesets.

Features:

  • Up, Down, and Side-facing animations
  • Walking, Jumping, Swimming, and Damaged Animations
  • Stabbing, Horizontal Swings, and Vertical Slices as well
  • Combine with readily accessible tilesets with more to come!

Licensing:
